articles.title: J.D. Martinez won't play for Boston Red Sox in American League Wild Card Game - ESPN India
articles.description: J.D. Martinez, who injured his ankle when he tripped over the second-base bag while jogging out to right field Sunday, is not on Boston's roster for the American League Wild Card Game vs. the Yankees.

articles.title: Anglo appoints Nompumelelo Zikalala as Kumba Iron Ore's first female CEO - News24
articles.description: Kumba Iron Ore, a subsidiary of Anglo American, announced on Tuesday that it has appointed De Beers' Nompumelelo 'Mpumi' Zikalala as its new CEO.
articles.content:
Kumba Iron Ore, a subsidiary of Anglo American, announced on Tuesday that it has appointed Nompumelelo 'Mpumi' Zikalala as its new CEO.

articles.title: Why are so many pregnant women not taking the vaccine? - The Guardian
articles.description: Only 31% of pregnant Americans are fully vaccinated. I felt a responsibility toward this bean-like bundle forming in my body – which, with the conflicting advice, made it hard for me to decide
